meanings.definition: A place where rabbits are kept or bred.
meanings.sent1: The rabbitry in our backyard is home to many fluffy bunnies.
meanings.sent2: We built a new rabbitry to house our growing rabbit population.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to sneak into the rabbitry, but the bunnies outsmarted him.
meanings.sent4: The rabbitry was a bustling community of furry residents, each with its own personality.
meanings.sent5: The rabbitry smelled of hay and happiness, a sanctuary for the adorable creatures.

meanings.definition: The practice of raising rabbits for meat or fur.
meanings.sent1: My grandfather taught me the art of rabbitry, passing down his knowledge through generations.
meanings.sent2: Rabbitry requires patience and dedication to ensure the well-being of the animals.
meanings.sent3: The rabbitry business was booming, with customers eager for fresh rabbit meat.
meanings.sent4: In the world of rabbitry, every fur coat tells a story of hard work and care.
meanings.sent5: She approached rabbitry with a passion, turning it into a successful enterprise.
